notes: Fixed issue with item checks only checking for the first item, will now filter correctly.
Added box shadow support for elements.
Removed change camera settings makes more sense to keep these internal in scripts.
Added function 'get_player_jobs', returns players job/s data.
Added function 'player_has_job', used to check if a player has a specific job/s with optional on duty check.
Fixed issue with permission checks for commands.
Refactor groups to allow inclusion of player data instead of array of player ids.
Updated table_contains to support checking nested tables.
Replaced escrow functions handling balances / inventory modification with new utils updated functions.
Fixed issue with store balance types not being adjusted by config values.
Replaced escrow functions handling balances / inventory modification with new utils updated functions.
